attributes.action: Increase in the State Old Age Pension
attributes.additional_details: The UK government treat the Illegal Immigrants better than the British people who have worked all their lives and payed into the system only to be totally ignored on retirement
attributes.background: Bring the Old Age Pension in the UK inline with Europe

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the amount of the state pension, but we're not sure how you want this to be increased. State pensions vary considerably across Europe, and many don't operate the same system of a flate-rate pension for everyone who is eligible.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
